alert.note: Alert for Grant (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 12 at 5:04AM MDT until further notice by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...Observed flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity for the following rivers in South Dakota... North Fork Whetstone River near Milbank affecting Grant County. .The following river forecasts include forecast precipitation through the next 24 hours. Any additional future precipitation could affect the forecasts. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring. * WHERE...North Fork Whetstone River near Milbank. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 1062.0 feet, Water reaches the top of the bridge on 144th Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 1061.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:15 AM CDT Wednesday was 1061.2 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 1056.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr. The next statement will be issued Thursday afternoon by 215 PM CDT.
